selAmazon

Class AmazonScraper

  • java.lang.Object
    • selAmazon.AmazonScraper

  • public class AmazonScraper
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that manages the scraping. Requires a WebDriver which will run all the actions. Always remember to destroy any instance of this class, if you dont, you will have to manually close the browser opened.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AmazonScraper(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
      Constructor of AmazonScraper

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Closes the AmazonScraper's driver, closing out the browser's process.
      Book scrape(java.lang.String ISBN)
      Looks for the specified ISBN in Amazon.com and returns a Book with the scraped information.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AmazonScraper

        public AmazonScraper(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
        Constructor of AmazonScraper
        Parameters:
        driver - Instance of WebDriver. If using the package as a library, use BrowserFactory to create the driver, else if you have the Selenium library, you can create your own WebDriver.

    • Method Detail

      • scrape

        public Book scrape(java.lang.String ISBN)
            throws org.openqa.selenium.WebDriverException
        Looks for the specified ISBN in Amazon.com and returns a Book with the scraped information.
        Parameters:
        ISBN -
        Returns:
        Book object with the scraped data.
        Throws:
        org.openqa.selenium.WebDriverException - If the AmazonScraper driver is NULL, an exception will be thrown.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Closes the AmazonScraper's driver, closing out the browser's process.
